name: When We Collide
description:
Description

When We Collide is a 2D local multiplayer game where players race towards the centre of a procedurally generated level while playing characters with unique abilities.

The first player to arrive at the centre can collect a character specific bonus which will aid them in defeating their opponent.

http://www.mandlebar.com/

Controls

We recommend using controllers to play this game as two people using the same keyboard can be awkward however keyboard controls are available (player 2 requires a numpad) and either keyboard or controller can be used at any time.

For the default controls click Options on the Main Menu and then click Controls. You can change the controls in the launcher however you will need to understand Unity's input semantics here.
